pages.title: Permanent Mine
pages.text: The $(bold)create_mine$() tool builds a full mining operation:$(br2)$(bold)Phase 1: Staircase Shaft$(br)A walkable 2×1 staircase (no ladders needed) descends to the target Y-level. Torches placed every 8 blocks, auto-crafted from coal+sticks if needed. Lava is sealed with cobblestone.$(br2)$(bold)Phase 2: Hub Room$(br)A 7×5×4 room is cleared and furnished with:$(br)$(li)2 chests for item storage$(li)1 furnace$(li)1 crafting table$(li)4 torches (auto-crafted if needed)$(li)Cobblestone floor

pages.title: Branch Mining
pages.text: $(bold)Phase 3: Branch Mining$(br)From the hub, a central corridor extends forward. Branch tunnels are dug perpendicular to both sides:$(br2)$(li)3-block spacing between branches (every block visible)$(li)Poke holes every 4 blocks for extra coverage$(li)Wall ore scanning and mining$(li)Torches every 8 blocks (auto-crafted mid-mine)$(li)Auto-deposit at hub when inventory reaches 80%$(br2)$(bold)Parameters:$(br)$(thing)ore$() — target ore (determines Y-level)$(br)$(thing)branch_length$() — 8-40 blocks (default: 20)$(br)$(thing)branches_per_side$() — 1-8 pairs (default: 4)$(br)$(thing)new_mine$() — force a fresh mine (default: false)

pages.title: Mine Memory
pages.text: Mines are $(bold)remembered$() across sessions! When you create a mine, the entrance location is saved to the companion's memory.$(br2)$(bold)Automatic Resume$(br)If you say $(thing)"mine diamonds"$() again, the companion will return to the existing diamond mine and resume branch mining — no new shaft is dug.$(br2)$(bold)Force New Mine$(br)Say $(thing)"create new diamond mine"$() to start a completely fresh mine (the old location is overwritten).$(br2)$(bold)List Mines$(br)Ask $(thing)"where are my mines?"$() to see all remembered mine locations with coordinates and details.

pages.title: Safety Features
pages.text: The mining system handles hazards automatically:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Lava$() — Checks all adjacent faces before mining. Seals with cobblestone if found below.$(li)$(bold)Falling blocks$() — Mines gravel/sand columns up to 10 blocks.$(li)$(bold)Missing floor$() — Places cobblestone over gaps.$(li)$(bold)Inventory full$() — Returns to hub chests to deposit.$(li)$(bold)Out of torches$() — Auto-crafts from coal+sticks, or planks→sticks if needed.$(li)$(bold)Stuck detection$() — Skips unreachable areas after timeout.
